module.name: vertex_colours_for_tessellated_geometry
module.name.french: Couleurs des sommets de géométrie tessellée
module.keywords: module, vertices, tessellated geometry, RGB colour model

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of colour information association with vertices of tessellated geometry. It does not provide specifications associated with the use of colours. Colours are defined using RGB8 integer triples or RGBT8 integer quadruples.

inscope.li: association of colour information with vertices of a Tessellated_face;
association of colour information with vertices of a Tessellated_surface_set;
association of colour information with vertices of a Tessellated_shell;
association of colour information with vertices of a Tessellated_solid;
specification of colours using integer triples to represent RGB colours or integer quadruples to represent RGBT colour values with transparency.

outscope.li: association of colour information with any geometry elements which are not tessellated;
association of colour information with a Tessellated_edge or a Tessellated_vertex except when included as elements in a Tessellated_shell or Tessellated_solid;
the specification of semantics associated with the use of colours.

abbreviation.term: Red Green Blue Transparency eight-bit integer
